translation.en: Who?
translation.ja: 誰(だれ)だ？

translation.en: Unauthorized access. Oh!
translation.ja: 侵入者(しんにゅうしゃ)あり

translation.en: - - Here it is.
translation.ja: これよ

translation.en: Rey Kingston. But everyone knows him as the King.
translation.ja: レイ･キングストン 通称(つうしょう)キング

translation.en: Someone broke into our parents' system and stole Armageddon.
translation.ja: 昨晩 誰(だれ)かがうちから コードを盗(ぬす)んだ

translation.en: It could only have been the King.
translation.ja: キングに決まってる

translation.en: His new game, Hyskor, is what you're seeing on every device across the world.
translation.ja: 世界中に広がったのは 彼(かれ)の新作ゲームだ

translation.en: The FBI already raided his game studio this morning,
translation.ja: ＦＢＩが スタジオを捜索(そうさく)したが ＦＢＩが スタジオを捜索(そうさく)したが 〝ＯＳＳ捜索(そうさく)報告書〟

translation.en: but it was empty, and this King was nowhere to be found.
translation.ja: もぬけの殻(から)で キングもいなかった

translation.en: Well, in his games, he always hides the bad guy in a cool, secret lair.
translation.ja: ゲームの中で ラスボスは隠(かく)れてるの 秘密の場所に

translation.en: People, how do we find him? I want suggestions.
translation.ja: 捜(さが)し方を提案してくれ

translation.en: Well, my mom gave me this to track us.
translation.ja: ママがくれた追跡(ついせき)装置がある

translation.en: So maybe we reverse- track her tracker?
translation.ja: これを使って逆探知したら？

translation.en: That must be where your parents are located.
translation.ja: きっとそこにいる

translation.en: And quite possibly
translation.ja: おそらくは―

translation.en: the King.
translation.ja: キングも

translation.en: - Somebody else is in control. - It means the bad guys are gonna break in.
translation.ja: 誰(だれ)かいる 悪者が押(お)し入ってくるよ

translation.en: From there, there, and there.
translation.ja: そこと あそこと そっちから

translation.en: - What? - Trust me.
translation.ja: 何だと？

translation.en: - We've learned from experience. - Know how much money I pay for security?
translation.ja: 経験から分かるの 警備は厳重だ

translation.en: There's one!
translation.ja: 来た

translation.en: Get Armageddon out of here!
translation.ja: コードを外へ

translation.en: Protect the code!
translation.ja: 死守しろ

translation.en: Mom told us that we have to keep this safe until she finds us.
translation.ja: ママが合流するまで守れと

translation.en: Lasers.
translation.ja: レーザーだ

translation.en: Ambush.
translation.ja: 奇襲(きしゅう)も

translation.en: Go!
translation.ja: いくよ

translation.en: - Whoa! Did you see that? - See what happens if you kick 'em.
translation.ja: 今の見た？ けとばそう

translation.en: It did it again.
translation.ja: また光った

translation.en: Give me that!
translation.ja: よこせ

translation.en: Let the grown- ups handle this.
translation.ja: 大人に任せろ

translation.en: Give me the code.
translation.ja: コードをよこせ

translation.en: They're getting away!
translation.ja: 逃(に)げられる

translation.en: - We need to find out where they're going. - Bronson, we need eyes on the Heck Knight.
translation.ja: 行き先を ブロンソン　見つけて

translation.en: Devlin! Get up and go chase them!
translation.ja: デヴリン　追いなさいよ

translation.en: You…
translation.ja: 君は…

translation.en: The bad guys are escaping on the lake.
translation.ja: 悪者が水面を逃(に)げてる

translation.en: We'll never catch them.
translation.ja: 追えない

translation.en: You can do the driving.
translation.ja: 運転して

translation.en: But only OSS agents know how to drive this.
translation.ja: ムリだよ ＯＳＳのスパイじゃない

translation.en: - - Thanks, Bronson!
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: I just remembered I get seasick.
translation.ja: ぼく 船酔(ふなよ)いする

translation.en: They're getting away!
translation.ja: 逃(に)げちゃう

translation.en: Our boat can't swim.
translation.ja: ぼくら潜(もぐ)れない

translation.en: Yeah, well, their boats can't fly.
translation.ja: でも向こうは飛べないよね

translation.en: Bronson, airborne mode.
translation.ja: ブロンソン　飛行モード

translation.en: Bronson, here's the location we got from the necklace.
translation.ja: これが逆探知した場所よ

translation.en: Fly us there.
translation.ja: 連れてって

translation.en: Then we can get the code and save Mom and Dad.
translation.ja: コードを入手し ふたりを救出だ

translation.en: Why are you still reading that book?
translation.ja: まだ読んでるの？

translation.en: These are the cheat codes to life.
translation.ja: 人生の裏技(うらわざ)だもん

translation.en: You shouldn't cheat the King. It'll backfire on you.
translation.ja: ズルしたら 自分に返ってくるよ

translation.en: Be smart and play fair.
translation.ja: 賢(かしこ)くフェアに

translation.en: - Doesn't work. - How can you say that?
translation.ja: 甘(あま)いね どうして

translation.en: Remember when we snuck into Dad's office and found that puzzle he was working on?
translation.ja: パパの部屋で見つけた パズルを覚えてる？

translation.en: Uh- huh. The one that was really tricky to finish.
translation.ja: 難しかったよね

translation.en: When I solved it for him, I thought he'd be happy,
translation.ja: 解いたらパパが喜ぶかと

translation.en: but he got mad at me for sneaking into his work, saying I was dishonest.
translation.ja: でも逆に 忍(しの)び込(こ)んだことで怒(おこ)られた

translation.en: Yeah. Then he put up the tech restrictions on all our stuff.
translation.ja: その後 ルールが 厳しくなったよね

translation.en: See? Telling the truth only got me in trouble.
translation.ja: 正直になると いいことがない

translation.en: Maybe at first.
translation.ja: 初めはそうかも

translation.en: But in the end, honesty always wins.
translation.ja: でも最後は正直が一番なの

translation.en: King's lair up ahead!
translation.ja: キングのアジトだ

translation.en: - We're not slowing down. - Bronson, what's wrong?
translation.ja: 速度が落ちない なんで？

translation.en: We're gonna crash into that wall!
translation.ja: ぶつかっちゃう

translation.en: - That wall isn't really there. - Oh.
translation.ja: 壁(かべ)はニセモノね

translation.en: Polygon- based architecture.
translation.ja: ポリゴン製の建物か

translation.en: Just like in old video games.
translation.ja: 昔のゲームみたい

translation.en: This guy is living the dream.
translation.ja: 夢の暮らしだな

translation.en: No way.
translation.ja: ウソだろ

translation.en: This whole place is covered in some sort of AR overlay.
translation.ja: 建物を包んでるのは 拡張現実(ＡＲ)だ

translation.en: AR? That hologram stuff
translation.ja: ＡＲって 実際と違(ちが)う見た目にする ホログラム？

translation.en: that makes things look different than they are?
translation.ja: 実際と違(ちが)う見た目にする ホログラム？

translation.en: Yeah, that stuff.
translation.ja: それだよ

translation.en: Maybe these glasses can help us find Mom and Dad.
translation.ja: これで ふたりを捜(さが)せる

translation.en: Don't take a nap.
translation.ja: 寝(ね)ないで

translation.en: We have to keep trying or stop the code so we can get back to the kids.
translation.ja: コードを止めて 子どもたちのもとへ

translation.en: Even if we can escape, I don't think I can stop this.
translation.ja: ここを出ても 止められないよ

translation.en: But you made the code. Can't you unmake it?
translation.ja: あなたが作ったのに？

translation.en: Yes and no.
translation.ja: そうだが ムリだ

translation.en: Operation Fireball?
translation.ja: 火だるま作戦さ

translation.en: Of course. We had to take down that villain Vargos.
translation.ja: ヴァーゴスを倒(たお)した作戦ね

translation.en: We were supposed to destroy his lair and everything in it,
translation.ja: 彼(かれ)のアジトを破壊(はかい)する時

translation.en: but I found plans for this weapon.
translation.ja: この武器の計画を知った

translation.en: Plans for the Armageddon Code?
translation.ja: アルマゲドン･コードの？

translation.en: I… I brought the plans back home
translation.ja: その計画を持ち帰り

translation.en: so I could finish building the code, but I…
translation.ja: コードを完成させようと…

translation.en: I couldn't figure it out. I failed.
translation.ja: だがムリだった

translation.en: - How did you finish it? - I didn't.
translation.ja: でも完成してる 僕(ぼく)じゃない

translation.en: Tony did.
translation.ja: トニーだ

translation.en: He doesn't even really know it, but he did.
translation.ja: 自覚してないが あの子が作った

translation.en: - How is that possible? - He got into my work somehow.
translation.ja: まさか 部屋に入られた

translation.en: He knew the plans better than I did.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)より計画に詳(くわ)しいよ

translation.en: He finished what I started, and I built Armageddon on top of what he gave me.
translation.ja: あの子が作り 僕(ぼく)は仕上げをしただけ

translation.en: I could've told him everything, but I scolded him and put tech restrictions up to protect the code.
translation.ja: コードを守るため 真実を隠(かく)し 叱(しか)ってしまった

translation.en: The kids don't even know that's why everything they love is being kept from them.
translation.ja: 子どもたちは好きなことを 禁止される理由も知らない

translation.en: And this is all my fault.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)のせいだ

translation.en: That is quite a story.
translation.ja: ずいぶんな話だな

translation.en: I knew you were hiding something from me.
translation.ja: 何か隠(かく)してると思ったよ

translation.en: But it doesn't matter who made what.
translation.ja: だが 誰(だれ)が作ったかは 関係ない

translation.en: I've taken the missing piece from your children,
translation.ja: 残りの部分はいただいた

translation.en: and within minutes, the code will be ready to fire.
translation.ja: あと数分でコードが発動する

translation.en: Your kids failed you.
translation.ja: ダメな子たち

translation.en: Or maybe you failed them.
translation.ja: 親のせいかな

translation.en: So Tony made the code.
translation.ja: トニーが作ったのか

translation.en: Now no one in the world can stop me.
translation.ja: 誰(だれ)も私を止められない

translation.en: Tony! Tony made it!
translation.ja: トニーが作ったとは

translation.en: There's a computer behind this panel.
translation.ja: この裏に操作盤(そうさばん)が

translation.en: Bronson, we need your help.
translation.ja: 手伝って

translation.en: Now we can download a map of this place.
translation.ja: マップをダウンロードだ

translation.en: Look. The prison cells are right by the King's VR pods
translation.ja: ＶＲポッドが 監禁(かんきん)部屋の横にある

translation.en: he showed on that video at school.
translation.ja: 学校で見たやつだ

translation.en: I hear footsteps.
translation.ja: 足音がする

translation.en: - Just don't look down. - I might've already looked down.
translation.ja: 下を見るな もう見ちゃった

translation.en: Armageddon is close to being combined.
translation.ja: アルマゲドンの完成が近い

translation.en: Then it will be unstoppable.
translation.ja: 完成すれば我々は無敵

translation.en: The King is already combining the code. We have to find Mom and Dad now.
translation.ja: もうコードを結合させてる ふたりを見つけなきゃ

translation.en: Those Hyskor characters are just AR overlays too.
translation.ja: 兵士にもＡＲを被(かぶ)せてある

translation.en: They're actually robots.
translation.ja: ただのロボットだ

translation.en: Those robots aren't so scary.
translation.ja: あんまり怖(こわ)くない

translation.en: - We need to jump. - What? Are you crazy?
translation.ja: 跳(と)ぼう 本気？

translation.en: - We need to jump. - No!
translation.ja: 跳(と)ぶよ イヤだ

translation.en: Those things are totally scary.
translation.ja: 怖(こわ)かったじゃん

translation.en: This way to the prison cells.
translation.ja: こっちだよ

translation.en: - Is that… - Our kids.
translation.ja: あれ… うちの子

translation.en: - Patty! - Mom! Dad!
translation.ja: パティ　トニー パパ　ママ

translation.en: Oh, my babies!
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: Are you safe?
translation.ja: 無事だった？

translation.en: Stand back.
translation.ja: 下がって

translation.en: I'm setting my Magna Boots from pull to push.
translation.ja: どこでもブーツを 反発に設定する

translation.en: - Oh! - Well done! - Well done! - That's my girl. Oh!
translation.ja: すごい　よくできたわね

translation.en: I can't believe you found us. How… How did you even get here?
translation.ja: 見つけてくれるなんて どうやって来たの？

translation.en: Aw. Bronson flew us in the Super Ducky that we jacked from the OSS.
translation.ja: 盗(ぬす)んだスーパー･ダッキーで 飛んできた

translation.en: - I am so proud… - That is…
translation.ja: 感心だ

translation.en: - …in this moment - …just beyond, my sweets.
translation.ja: すばらしいわ ふたりとも

translation.en: Armageddon is combined. Launching in six minutes.
translation.ja: アルマゲドン 結合完了(かんりょう) 発動まで６分

translation.en: What now, master spies? The clock's ticking.
translation.ja: 次は？　時間がない

translation.en: Actually, I have a really solid plan inspired by our greatest mission.
translation.ja: 最高の任務をヒントにした 計画がある

translation.en: - Operation Fireball. - You got it.
translation.ja: 火だるま作戦ね 正解

translation.en: What was this Operation Fireball exactly?
translation.ja: 火だるま作戦って 何したの？

translation.en: Our mission was to infiltrate the operation of an evil man named Vargos.
translation.ja: 悪党ヴァーゴスの企(たくら)みを 阻止(そし)する任務だった

translation.en: And we were able to infiltrate his lair by
translation.ja: 彼(かれ)のアジトに入るため―

translation.en: knocking on the door.
translation.ja: ドアをノック

translation.en: You just knocked on his door?
translation.ja: ノックだけ？

translation.en: - With a truck. - Big truck.
translation.ja: 車で 大型の

translation.en: We used our gadgets to get past the guards.
translation.ja: 道具で警備をかわし…

translation.en: Friendly gadgets?
translation.ja: 優(やさ)しい道具？

translation.en: I went to stop the superweapon while your mother negotiated with Vargos.
translation.ja: ママが話し合う間 パパは兵器を止めに

translation.en: Negotiate? You mean beat up, don't you?
translation.ja: 話し合い？ 殴(なぐ)り合いじゃ？

translation.en: That sums it up. I couldn't stop the bomb in time.
translation.ja: まあな パパは兵器の発動を なるべく遅(おく)らせ…

translation.en: I had to stall just long enough…
translation.ja: パパは兵器の発動を なるべく遅(おく)らせ…

translation.en: So that we can set our own bomb off instead.
translation.ja: アジトに爆弾(ばくだん)を仕掛(しか)けた

translation.en: We wiped out Vargos's operation in one glorious…
translation.ja: ヴァーゴスの計画は 消し飛んだ

translation.en: Fireball.
translation.ja: 火だるまになってね

translation.en: - I love you. - I love you more.
translation.ja: 最高 愛してる

translation.en: Awesome.
translation.ja: カッコいい

translation.en: Not awesome! You could've found a better way.
translation.ja: カッコよくない もっといい方法が

translation.en: I'd… Hmm? How?
translation.ja: 例えば どんな？

translation.en: You could've asked nicely to see Mr. Vargos.
translation.ja: 会いたいと頼(たの)めばよかった

translation.en: You could've used a thought bubble to keep the guards entertained.
translation.ja: 気持ち玉で 警備を笑わせればよかった

translation.en: You could've gotten an understanding of his interior- design sense.
translation.ja: ヴァーゴスの インテリアをほめて

translation.en: You could've intervened in his plan with a softer touch.
translation.ja: 優(やさ)しく説得すればよかった

translation.en: I guess we… could've considered that.
translation.ja: その手もあった

translation.en: So that maybe instead of Operation Fireball,
translation.ja: そしたら 火だるま作戦じゃなく

translation.en: it could be Operation Peace and Harmony.
translation.ja: 平和とハーモニー作戦になる

translation.en: - That's my child. - Yeah. Yeah. Certainly not mine.
translation.ja: ママ似 パパ似じゃないな

translation.en: - Armageddon in four minutes. - We have four minutes left.
translation.ja: アルマゲドンまで４分 あと４分だ

translation.en: I could come up with a fantastic plan if I had a map of this place.
translation.ja: マップがあれば 計画を練れるのに

translation.en: - Boop. - Yes! Well done.
translation.ja: はい いいぞ

translation.en: We have to get to these computer terminals to stall for time.
translation.ja: コンピュータから時間稼(かせ)ぎを

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.ja: 行くぞ

translation.en: - That's the whole plan? - Yup.
translation.ja: それだけ？ 時間を稼(かせ)ぎ ＯＳＳに救援(きゅうえん)信号を送る

translation.en: We're gonna buy some time to send a signal to OSS for help.
translation.ja: 時間を稼(かせ)ぎ ＯＳＳに救援(きゅうえん)信号を送る

translation.en: - We stall when we can beat the King? - Armageddon is being armed.
translation.ja: キングを倒(たお)さないの？ もう発動を遅(おく)らせるしか できない

translation.en: Nothing we can do now except slow down its final process. Let's split up.
translation.ja: もう発動を遅(おく)らせるしか できない 君と僕(ぼく)で手分けを

translation.en: - I'll take Tony. You take Patty. - They have Magna Boots.
translation.ja: 君と僕(ぼく)で手分けを 子どもたちは どこでもブーツで行ける

translation.en: - They can access the branching path. - No, no, no, no.
translation.ja: 子どもたちは どこでもブーツで行ける 危険すぎる

translation.en: - It's too dangerous for them. - You're right.
translation.ja: 危険すぎる そうよね

translation.en: Come here a second.
translation.ja: 聞いて

translation.en: We can do this.
translation.ja: できるよ

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: うん

translation.en: - Okay. Hey, you two stick together, okay? - Okay.
translation.ja: いいわ ふたり一緒(いっしょ)に行動してね

translation.en: - And stick to the plan. - Got it.
translation.ja: 計画どおりにな 了解(りょうかい)

translation.en: We love you too!
translation.ja: 大好きよ

translation.en: - I immediately regret this. - So much.
translation.ja: もう後悔(こうかい)を 私も

translation.en: - Yeah. We should go. - Yep.
translation.ja: 行こうか ええ

translation.en: - I need eyes in the hall. - On it.
translation.ja: 見張りを 了解(りょうかい)

translation.en: Tony, we gotta hurry!
translation.ja: 急がないと

translation.en: I'm trying to beat Hyskor to stall for time.
translation.ja: クリアして時間稼(かせ)ぎだ

translation.en: You lost.
translation.ja: 負けた

translation.en: - I've got a new plan. - What new plan?
translation.ja: 計画変更(へんこう) どうするの？

translation.en: If we get to this elevator, we can stop the countdown.
translation.ja: エレベーターで止めに行く

translation.en: That's not what they told us to do. We have to stick to the plan.
translation.ja: パパの計画と違(ちが)う 指示どおりやって

translation.en: We have to do whatever it takes to win.
translation.ja: 勝つには何でもする

translation.en: I think you were right, Patty.
translation.ja: パティの言うとおりかも

translation.en: About what?
translation.ja: 何が？

translation.en: We're not gonna make it.
translation.ja: 間に合わない

translation.en: That must be the central computer. I can use it to stop Armageddon.
translation.ja: 中央コンピュータだ これで止められる

translation.en: Wait a minute. I know this.
translation.ja: 待てよ　これ知ってる

translation.en: I made this.
translation.ja: ぼくが作った

translation.en: You made the Armageddon Code?
translation.ja: アルマゲドン･コードを？

translation.en: Sort of. It was that weird puzzle from Dad's work, but it wasn't a puzzle.
translation.ja: まあね パパのパズルは ゲームじゃなく

translation.en: - It was the plans for Armageddon Code. - How are you gonna stop it though?
translation.ja: 設計図だったんだ 止め方は？

translation.en: The same way I solved it.
translation.ja: 作成時と同じ

translation.en: The last part of the plan had a trick to it, where you couldn't tell if it was completed
translation.ja: コードは最後に仕掛(しか)けがあり 完成させるのが難しい

translation.en: because you had to do the same steps backwards.
translation.ja: 仕上げに逆から繰(く)り返すのさ

translation.en: That's how I'm going to break it.
translation.ja: それで壊(こわ)せる

translation.en: Okay. What do I do?
translation.ja: 何すれば？

translation.en: - Press that button. - Which one?
translation.ja: ボタンを どれ？

translation.en: - We're out of time! - Almost there.
translation.ja: 時間がないよ あと少し

translation.en: You couldn't tell if the code was completed or not.
translation.ja: 完成させるのが難しいって…

translation.en: Tony, wait! Stop! It's a trick!
translation.ja: これはワナだよ

translation.en: You have armed Armageddon.
translation.ja: アルマゲドン 発動

translation.en: What? I just stopped it.
translation.ja: なんで？　止めたのに

translation.en: Wrong, Tony.
translation.ja: 違(ちが)うな

translation.en: You've put it together for me.
translation.ja: 私のために完成させた

translation.en: - Mom! Dad! - Oh, the whole family!
translation.ja: ママ　パパ 家族が集合したな

translation.en: You weren't able to complete the code yourself, were you? Even after you got the missing piece.
translation.ja: 結合しても コードが 完成しなかったんだろ

translation.en: Only the true code creator can activate the world- conquering potential.
translation.ja: 真の開発者だけが 発動できたのさ

translation.en: I made this fake countdown so you, Tony, could combine it for me.
translation.ja: ニセのカウントダウンで トニーをだました

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: 助かったよ

translation.en: We downloaded Hyskor last night and caused all of this.
translation.ja: 「ハイスコア」なんか ダウンロードしたから

translation.en: No, no, no. You just wanted to play a game.

translation.ja: 彼(かれ)のゲームはプレーヤーを 改心させる

translation.en: - Hyskor has all the guidance he needs. - That's not how we work in the OSS.
translation.ja: 彼(かれ)には「ハイスコア」が必要 ＯＳＳの方法は違(ちが)う

translation.en: Actually, it is.
translation.ja: 違(ちが)わない

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.ja: 何だと？

translation.en: On page two of How To Be a Spy,
translation.ja: 本の２ページ目よ

translation.en: it states that the high- level OSS agent that catches the enemy
translation.ja: 敵をつかまえた 上位のスパイが

translation.en: is best suited to decide their judgment.
translation.ja: 処置を決める

translation.en: And because we caught the enemy and you didn't,
translation.ja: 捕(つか)まえたのは あなたじゃなくて私たち

translation.en: that makes us the high- level agents.
translation.ja: だからこっちが上位

translation.en: - Ooh! - Radical!
translation.ja: 最高だぜ

translation.en: - Smart kid. - Yeah.
translation.ja: 賢(かしこ)いな ああ

translation.en: Therefore, the King will be locked inside his lair under OSS surveillance
translation.ja: ではキングはＯＳＳの 監視(かんし)のもとゲーム内へ

translation.en: until he beats Hyskor.
translation.ja: クリアするまで

translation.en: - Yes!  -
translation.ja: やった

translation.en: What should have been done for your father
translation.ja: お父さんの無念は

translation.en: we're going to do for you.
translation.ja: ぼくらが晴らす

translation.en: You're saving me?
translation.ja: 私を救うのか？

translation.en: You'll be saving yourself by working through your own game.
translation.ja: 自分のゲームで 自分を救うのよ

translation.en: And with game theory, anything can be fixed.
translation.ja: ゲーム理論で直せる

translation.en: Or anyone.
translation.ja: 何だってね

translation.en: Watch me on the screen.
translation.ja: 画面を見てて

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: 感謝するよ

translation.en: I never thought our kids would show us how to be great spies.
translation.ja: 子どもにスパイの教えを 受けるとは

translation.en: They showed us how to be something better.
translation.ja: もっといい教えよ

translation.en: Devlin, two decades of service with you in the OSS has been an honor, but
translation.ja: デヴリン　ＯＳＳでの20年は すばらしかったが…

translation.en: we quit.
translation.ja: 辞(や)める

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.ja: なぜ？

translation.en: We'd rather figure out our own way to save the world.
translation.ja: 世界を救いたいの

translation.en: Honestly and together.
translation.ja: 正直に 家族全員で

translation.en: Sir. The Armageddon Code.
translation.ja: ボス　コードです

translation.en: - Is this the only copy? - Yes, it is.
translation.ja: 唯一(ゆいいつ)のデータ？ はい

translation.en: - We don't need it. -
translation.ja: もう不要だ

translation.en: Not in the new OSS. You might like some of the changes we'll be making,
translation.ja: 新ＯＳＳではな きっと改革を気に入る

translation.en: to turn the OSS into a more effective and honest job.
translation.ja: 今後はもっと効果的で 正直な仕事をするよ

translation.en: - Then we're staying. - See you at your desks Monday morning?
translation.ja: では残ります 月曜に出勤を

translation.en: All of your desks.
translation.ja: 全員で

translation.en: All of our desks! Oh! So proud of you, buddies.
translation.ja: 全員だってさ えらいぞ

translation.en: Well played.
translation.ja: よくできました

translation.en: - - Well, Spy Kids.
translation.ja: スパイキッズ

translation.en: Good morning, Devlin.
translation.ja: デヴリン

translation.en: I have a little progress report on your last mission.
translation.ja: 前回の任務の その後だ

translation.en: Not only has the world gone back to normal,
translation.ja: 世界に日常が戻(もど)り

translation.en: but the one who caused Armageddon is now helping people with the use of technology,
translation.ja: 黒幕だった男は現在 技術(ぎじゅつ)で人助けをしており

translation.en: calling himself the Court Jester.
translation.ja: 道化(どうけ)と名乗っています

translation.en: He did it.
translation.ja: やったね

translation.en: He beat his game.
translation.ja: クリアしたんだ

translation.en: You ready for more?
translation.ja: 次の任務を？

translation.en: - Oh yeah. -
translation.ja: 〝スタート〞 もちろん 〝スタート〞
